## Creating `promoters.bed` file for region filtering

* Download BED file of promoter positions from [BioMart](http://www.ensembl.org/info/data/biomart/index.html)
* Add `chr` prefix to bed file:
```
sed -i 's/^/chr/' mart_export.bed
```
* Use [UCSC liftover page](https://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgLiftOver) to lift over to hg19
* Remove `chr` prefix from lifted over file and sort:
```
sed 's/chr//' hglft_genome_42240_8337a0.bed | sort -V -k 1 > promoters_hg19.bed
```
